amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to require within 5 years a study of EPA actions under CERCLA to clean up PFAS contamination sites.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to require within 5 years a study of EPA actions under CERCLA to clean up PFAS contamination sites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
